key_risks: Regulatory and legal risks due to recent FTC settlement and ongoing compliance challenges
Data security and privacy concerns as a cloud-based SaaS provider
Economic sensitivity tied to the real estate market
Competitive pressures from rivals like Yardi, RealPage, and Clio
controversies: Settlement with the FTC for $4.25 million over FCRA violations
Insider selling of $1.09 million worth of stock by William Shane Trigg
social_issues: Challenges in the rental market, such as increased competition and shifting renter preferences
Staff recruitment and retention challenges in the property management industry
governance_issues: Potential vulnerabilities in compliance and data accuracy practices highlighted by the FTC settlement

sources.title: Why Today's Hiring & Retention Challenges Are Different
sources.snippet: Staff recruitment and turnover have historically challenged the property management industry. Data from CEL & Associates, Inc. reports pre-pandemic turnover nearing 33%, topping the average rate across all industries. Several new factors, including the recent pandemic-induced rethinking of work, the traditional workplace, and even the workforce, have only contributed to the issue.
